name: @approov/ns-approov-sdk
description: Approov SDK support for nativescript with angular/vue support and TLS pinning

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run ngcc && npm run ngc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --rebuild=true
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove ns-approov-sdk && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare-ng: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove ns-approov-sdk && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare-vue: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin remove ns-approov-sdk && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
